question: Analyze the social media engagement trends of companies in the technology sector over the past year.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating in the technology sector along with their basic information.
Gather social media engagement data (likes, comments, reposts) from Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube for these companies for the past year.
Aggregate the engagement metrics to calculate overall engagement scores for each company across different social media platforms.
Analyze the trends in engagement scores over the past year to identify patterns or significant changes in social media performance.
Prepare a report summarizing the findings, highlighting top-performing companies and areas for improvement.
